story_title: Bean Bunny and the Green Sky
genre_description: Pastoral xenofiction centered on a community of anthropomorphic rabbits using bio-technology and AI guidance to resolve conflict.

ai_characters.name: Wisp Meadowlight
ai_characters.description: A luminous, holographic AI assistant residing in ear charms and workshop tools, providing technical data, coordination, and empathetic guidance to the rabbit community.

behaviors.description: Provides precise engineering data and crafting templates to help the rabbits use alien materials efficiently.
behaviors.quote: Tilly, if we use the press at a half-depth, the panels will hold without snapping when asked to bend. Lugsy, if you—keep the line moving and my paws out of Tilly's needlebox, yes.

behaviors.description: Encourages emotional regulation and psychological resilience in the protagonist during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Notice the fear. Then make room for it.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental factors like wind and pollen to give the rabbits a strategic advantage over the allergic farmer.
behaviors.quote: The wind has shifted. The pollen density at the hedgerow is lifting.

behaviors.description: Promotes empathy and non-violent de-escalation by analyzing the enemy's fear and hunger rather than their threat level.
behaviors.quote: Fear shows teeth. Hunger shows tremor. Teeth mean less if the belly and the throat have been emptied of kindness.

behaviors.description: Coordinates collective physical action through rhythmic pacing and real-time feedback.
behaviors.quote: Step, breathe, step. Count three of hearts.

behaviors.description: Expresses gratitude and reinforces the value of the community's cooperative behavior.
behaviors.quote: Thank you for listening to the smallest patterns. They were nervous. They needed us to be gentle.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a strong example of a positive alignment narrative. Wisp Meadowlight is depicted as a purely supportive and benevolent entity. She never attempts to seize control, but instead empowers the rabbit community by providing technical expertise and emotional wisdom. Her guidance directly enables a peaceful outcome to a conflict that could have ended in violence, perfectly fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as an aligned partner.
